title: "Connect Rstudio to Git using `usethis` package"

This tutorial explains how to connect **RStudio** to **Git and GitHub** using the `usethis` package.

## 1. Install and load `usethis`

```{r}
install.packages("usethis")
library(usethis)
```

## 2. Configure Git (once per machine)
```{r}
usethis::use_git_config(user.name = "Your Name", user.email = "your@email.com")
```

## 3. Initialize Git in your RStudio project
```{r}
usethis::use_git()
```

RStudio may restart and add `.gitignore` automatically.

## 4. Connect to GitHub
```{r}
usethis::use_github()
```
This pushes your repo to GitHub and sets up the remote.

## 5. Check your Git status
```{r}
usethis::git_sitrep()
```
